# InspireHome — Complete Store Information

> InspireHome (inspirehome.gr) is a Greek online furniture and home decor e-commerce store, operated by Καμπλατζής (Kaplantzis), based in Thessaloniki, Greece.

## Store Overview

InspireHome provides a comprehensive range of furniture and home decoration products. Our mission is to help customers transform their living spaces into inspiring environments with quality furniture at competitive prices.

### Value Propositions
1. **Free Shipping** — On all orders over €100 within Greece
2. **Quality Guarantee** — 2-year warranty on all furniture products
3. **Easy Returns** — 14-day hassle-free return policy
4. **Customer Support** — Available Monday through Saturday

## Complete Product Categories

### Καθιστικό (Living Room)
Browse our living room collection including modern sofas, comfortable armchairs, elegant coffee tables, functional TV units, and decorative rugs. Our living room furniture combines contemporary design with lasting comfort.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/καθιστικό

### Υπνοδωμάτιο (Bedroom)
Create your dream bedroom with our selection of beds, mattresses, wardrobes, nightstands, and dressers. From minimalist to classic styles, find furniture that ensures restful sleep and organized living.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/υπνοδωμάτιο

### Τραπεζαρία (Dining Room)
Gather around beautiful dining tables with matching chairs. Our dining collection includes sideboards, bar stools, and display cabinets to complete your dining experience.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/τραπεζαρία

### Γραφείο (Office)
Work productively with ergonomic office furniture. Browse desks, adjustable office chairs, bookshelves, and storage solutions designed for both home offices and professional spaces.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/γραφείο

### Παιδικό (Kids)
Safe and playful furniture for children's rooms. Our kids' collection includes beds, study desks, storage solutions, and fun accessories designed with safety and creativity in mind.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/παιδικό

### Αποθήκευση (Storage)
Maximize your space with our storage solutions. From shelving units and cabinets to closet organizers, find smart ways to keep your home tidy and organized.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/αποθήκευση

### Εξωτερικού Χώρου (Outdoor)
Enjoy your garden, balcony, or terrace with weather-resistant outdoor furniture. Browse patio dining sets, lounge chairs, garden sofas, and outdoor lighting.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/εξωτερικού-χώρου

### Διακόσμηση (Decor)
Add the finishing touches to your home. Our decor collection includes lighting fixtures, mirrors, vases, cushions, wall art, and decorative accessories.
- URL: https://inspirehome.gr/category/διακόσμηση

## Shipping & Delivery

- **Standard delivery:** 3-5 business days within mainland Greece
- **Island delivery:** 4-7 business days
- **Free shipping** on orders over €100
- Delivery by trusted courier partners with tracking
- Large furniture items include assembly instructions

## Payment Methods

- Credit/Debit cards (Visa, Mastercard)
- Bank transfer
- Cash on delivery (for eligible orders)

## Returns & Warranty

- **14-day return window** from date of delivery
- Products must be in original condition and packaging
- Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility (except for defective items)
- **2-year manufacturer warranty** on all furniture against defects
- Damaged/defective items replaced free of charge with photo evidence

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How do I place an order?**
A: Select your products, add them to your cart, and follow the checkout process. You can order as a guest or create an account.

**Q: Can I cancel my order?**
A: Yes, you can cancel before shipping. Contact us by phone or email immediately.

**Q: What are the shipping costs?**
A: Shipping is calculated based on weight and destination. Orders over €100 ship free within Greece.

**Q: How long does delivery take?**
A: Usually 3-5 business days. Islands may take 1-2 additional days.

**Q: Can I return a product?**
A: Yes, within 14 days of delivery, in original condition. Return shipping is the customer's responsibility unless the item is defective.

**Q: What warranty do products have?**
A: All furniture comes with a 2-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.

**Q: What if I receive a damaged product?**
A: Contact us immediately with photos. We'll arrange a free replacement.

## Contact & Location

- **Phone:** +30 2310 000 000
- **Email:** info@inspirehome.gr
- **Physical Store:** Εθνικής Αμύνης 15, Θεσσαλονίκη 54621, Greece
- **Business Hours:** Mon-Fri 09:00-20:00, Sat 10:00-18:00, Sun Closed
- **Facebook:** https://www.facebook.com/inspire.home.kaplantzis/

## Data Access

- **Product Catalog (JSON):** https://inspirehome.gr/data/liberta-products.json
- **Sitemap (XML):** https://inspirehome.gr/api/sitemap.xml
- **robots.txt:** https://inspirehome.gr/robots.txt
